msContents.summary: This list contains suggestions for liturgies for both classes of the pratores sitikon and for the praktores argyrikon of the village of Syron.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
Archive of Petaus, son of Petaus, komogrammateus of Ptolemais Hormou

condition.ab: This rather dark-brown papyrus is rather regularly cut at all sides; however, in the bottom right corner a large piece of papyrus is missing. Furthermore, there are three large holes in the central part of the document. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick and somewhat careless cursive. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Syron Kome, Herakleides meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Peion, son of Apollonios, mother Thermouthis
Paaus, son of Sokmas. mother Heras
Ptolemaios, son of Sokrates, grandson of Philadelphos, with the nickname Selpis
Psontheus, son of Paaus, mother Tasooukis, with the nickname Tsemit
Paaus, son of Kammatais
Pathynis, son of Belekennis, mother Thermouthis
Kollouthos, son of Heras, mother Hera, . . . Phelix
Ptollion, son of Apynchis, mother Taseus
Miysis, son of Mouis, with the nickname Kats
Apynchis, son of Pathynis, mother . . . ., Kalatios
Papion, son of Potamon, mother Tasoucharion
Ptollas, son of Ptolemaios, Kalaoukis
Tyrannos, son of Pathynis
Potamon, son of Julius, physician
Ptollion, son of Sokmas, with the nickname Ansas
Paaus, son of Apynchis, with the nicknamea Alel
Potamon, son of Pathynis, grandson of Kanibis, . . .
Marres, son of Paaus, son of Platon
Neilos, son of Hatres, mother Thaesis
Sokras, son of . . ., mother Eserempis
Sokrates, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Neseus

provenance.p: Syron Kome, Herakleides meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: " Syron kome, as praktores demosias:;Peion, son of Apollonios, mother Thermouthis;;Paaus, son of Sokmas. mother Heras;;Ptolemaios, son of Sokrates, grandson of Philadelphos, with the nickname Selpis;;Psontheus, son of Paaus, mother Tasooukis, with the nickname Tsemit;;Paaus, son of Kammatais;;Pathynis, son of Belekennis, mother Thermouthis;;-------------------------;likewise praktores katoikias:;Kollouthos, son of Heras, mother Hera, . . . Phelix;;Ptollion, son of Apynchis, mother Taseus; ;Miysis, son of Mouis, with the nickname Kats;;Apynchis, son of Pathynis, mother . . . ., Kalatios;;likewise praktores argyrikon:;Papion, son of Potamon, mother Tasoucharion;;Ptollas, son of Ptolemaios, Kalaoukis;;Tyrannos, son of Pathynis;;Potamon, son of Julius, physician;;Ptollion, son of Sokmas, with the nickname Ansas;;Paaus, son of Apynchis, with the nicknamea Alel;;Potamon, son of Pathynis, grandson of Kanibis, . . . .;;Marres, son of Paaus, son of Platon;;Neilos, son of Hatres, mother Thaesis;;Sokras, son of . . ., mother Eserempis;;Sokrates, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Neseus."

listBibl.bibl: Hagedorn U - Hagedorn D - Youtie LC - Youtie HC, PPetaus, 64, 1969
